data.prayer: Lord, there are 32,947 people in the country of Sint Maarten who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.location_label: Photo from the country of Sint Maarten
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Sint Maarten be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Sint Maarten that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Lord, make the 3,216 believers in Sint Maarten to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 37,584 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the country of Sint Maarten.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Sint Maarten and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: God, guide the 3,216 believers in Sint Maarten to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
